source.sqlReaderQuery:
select SCHEMA_NAME(schema_id) as SchemaName, name as TableName from sys.tables
where SCHEMA_NAME(schema_id) != 'changefeed'
order by SCHEMA_NAME(schema_id)

select SCHEMA_NAME(schema_id) as SchemaName, name as TableName from sys.tables
where SCHEMA_NAME(schema_id) = 'SalesLT'
order by SCHEMA_NAME(schema_id)

source.oracleReaderQuery: select hr.getnum('102','373') as result from dual;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select SCHEMA_NAME(schema_id) as SchemaName, name as TableName from sys.tables
where SCHEMA_NAME(schema_id) != 'changefeed'
order by SCHEMA_NAME(schema_id)

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmployeeKey as integer,
		ParentEmployeeKey as integer,
		EmployeeNationalIDAlternateKey as string,
		ParentEmployeeNationalIDAlternateKey as string,
		SalesTerritoryKey as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		HireDate as date,
		BirthDate as date,
		LoginID as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		MaritalStatus as string,
		EmergencyContactName as string,
		EmergencyContactPhone as string,
		SalariedFlag as boolean,
		Gender as string,
		PayFrequency as integer,
		BaseRate as decimal(19,4),
		VacationHours as short,
		SickLeaveHours as short,
		CurrentFlag as boolean,
		SalesPersonFlag as boolean,
		DepartmentName as string,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date,
		Status as string,
		EmployeePhoto as binary
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dbo.DimEmployee where SalariedFlag = 1',
	format: 'query') ~> Employee
Employee derive(Salesperson = concatWS(" ",FirstName,LastName)) ~> CombineFirstLastName
CombineFirstLastName select(mapColumn(
		EmployeeKey,
		EmployeeID = EmployeeNationalIDAlternateKey,
		UPN = EmailAddress,
		Salesperson,
		Title
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		StateProvince as string,
		TotalOrders as long
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ADLSG2output
